sentences.en: an avenue of stately chestnut trees
sentences.cn: 两边有雄伟高大栗树的林荫道

sentences.en: Chestnut is in the family Fagaceae which also includes oak and beech.
sentences.cn: 栗属植物属山毛榉科,此科还包括橡属和山毛榉属.

sentences.en: forests full of oak and chestnut
sentences.cn: 长满橡树和栗子树的森林

sentences.en: From fifteen to closing - time he was a fixture in the Chestnut Tree.
sentences.cn: 从十五点到打烊,他是栗树咖啡馆的常客.

sentences.en: Her hair is a chestnut color.
sentences.cn: 她的头发是褐色[栗色]的.

sentences.en: I'll bet ten dollars on the chestnut horse.
sentences.cn: 我要在这匹栗色马上下十元赌注.

sentences.en: In the garden, the leaves of the horse chestnut had already fallen.
sentences.cn: 花园里，七叶树已经落叶了。

sentences.en: One of them scooped up a water chestnut, still tiny and milky white.
sentences.cn: 顺手从水里捞上一棵菱角来, 菱角还很嫩很小,乳白色.

sentences.en: Research for improvement of chestnut has been discouraging and encouraging.
sentences.cn: 栗树改良的研究工作曾令人失望又曾使人鼓舞.

sentences.en: She saw Manya twiddling a young green chestnut leaf under her nose.
sentences.cn: 她看到玛尼娅在鼻子底下捻弄着一片新绿的栗树叶子.
那匹栗色马将要退休了.

sentences.en: The Chestnut Tree was almost empty.
sentences.cn: 栗树咖啡馆里阒无一人.

sentences.en: The cock's breast is tinged with chestnut.
sentences.cn: 这只公鸡胸部羽毛呈浅栗色，带有白色细条纹。

sentences.en: The fruit is rather like a sweet chestnut.
The water chestnut floated placidly there , where it would grow.
sentences.cn: 那棵菱角就又安安稳稳浮在水面上生长去了.

sentences.en: We have a chestnut tree in the bottom of our garden.
sentences.cn: 我们的花园尽头有一棵栗树.

words.tran_cn: 栗子；栗色；[园艺]栗树；栗色马

phrases.tran_cn: 陈腐的笑话；老掉牙的故事；陈旧乏味的题材

phrases.phrase: pull someone's chestnuts out of the fire
phrases.tran_cn: 为某人火中取栗，为他人冒风险

trans.tran_en: a smooth red-brown nut that you can eat
